text: the most powerful AI system ever right here on this laptop. Full knowledge base of all the articles that I ever come across, articles, videos, tweets, posts, everything. I throw them all in this single place and I could do crazy searches. So, look, I just drop an article in here. It saves it locally on this computer and then I can ask questions like, "Show me articles I've saved about OpenAI." Here you can see it's typing. And look at this. After a few seconds, I have every single article that has ever mentioned Open AI from my knowledge base. Here's the actual prompt to build it
